nodes.text: The Spined Rancor Poster was the name of a painting available in the galaxy sometime after the Battle of Yavin during the time of the Galactic Civil War. It depicted the theoretical process for incubating a spined rancor.
The Spined Rancor Poster was a painting in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
The Spined Rancor Poster loot card was only obtainable from the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game "Nightsister Roundup" scenario which lasted through Tuesday, March 16, 2010 at 2 p.m. PST.
